title: My First Post

content:
Hi, I’m Giacomo Ettore Rocco I was born in Udine, Friuli Venezia Giulia, Italy! On April 29, 1995.
Photo taken during my walk along the Magna Via Francigena in Agrigento
I’m a data scientist with strong analytical and problem-solving skills developed in data-intensive environments. I specialize in machine learning and data visualization to support data-driven decision-making.
Background My passion for programming began in high school, where I combined game development with data analysis — creating virtual environments that generated insights and building intuitive dashboards. During my Master’s thesis, I applied reinforcement learning to design an AI agent capable of playing Settlers of Catan in a stochastic environment, deepening my understanding of decision-making under uncertainty.
I hold a Master’s degree in Data Science and Scientific Computing from the University of Trieste and a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Udine.
Current Interests Game Development: I’ve always had a passion for creating games. I’d love to work as a content creator in video games or as a data-oriented game programmer. I have experience with Unity and a strong passion for optimization Software Development: Particularly interested in how LLMs are transforming and accelerating the development process Side Projects: Currently developing an application that tracks pilgrims along famous routes such as the Camino de Santiago and the Magna Via Francigena, using React, Python, and Redis Pilgrimage Walks: I love doing long-distance pilgrimage walks like the Magna Via Francigena. These journeys offer time for reflection and connection with history and nature Machine Learning: Exploring cutting-edge techniques in deep learning and reinforcement learning Chess: Avid chess player who enjoys strategic thinking and game theory What I Do I specialize in turning complex data into actionable insights. My work combines statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms, and software engineering to build robust data-driven solutions. I’m passionate about creating interactive visualizations and dashboards that make data accessible to everyone.
My ultimate goal is to combine my passion for data science with my love for video games and app development. I’d love to turn this into a career, working at the intersection of data analytics, game development, and software engineering.
When I’m not working with data, I love programming, especially video games. I enjoy building web applications and exploring new technologies, particularly in the AI/ML space.
Get in Touch Feel free to reach out if you want to discuss data science, machine learning, software development, or potential collaborations!

title: About Me

content:
This is my CV: Professional Experience Data Scientist, Aftersales Business Intelligence Gruppo Danieli | Buttrio, Italy September 2023 – September 2025
Streamlined data collection methods to minimize analysis errors Automated repetitive tasks using Power BI, Python, and Azure, significantly saving time during the analytical process Translated business requirements into data-driven solutions, providing value-added insights that directly contributed to strategic goals Focused on pricing strategy development with multiple in-depth training sessions Designed interactive dashboards and reports, providing real-time business intelligence to stakeholders Implemented robust data governance practices, ensuring data integrity and compliance Master Thesis Project Intern Evolutionary Robotics and Artificial Life Lab, University of Trieste | Trieste, Italy March – July 2023
Conducted research and development of an AI agent using Reinforcement Learning to operate in stochastic, graph-based environments Designed and implemented custom training pipelines, optimizing model performance through experimentation Utilized Python, PyTorch, and PyTorch Geometric for model development Employed GitHub for version control and collaborative workflow management Machine Learning Developer Ernst & Young | Trieste, Italy February – May 2022
Developed software for automatic military document control verification and compliance Improved machine learning model accuracy using advanced OCR algorithms Tools: Microsoft Azure, Python, Microsoft Excel Teamwork and customer consulting (B2C) Data Reporter Intern IFCQ Certificazioni Srl | San Daniele, Italy December 2020 – February 2021
Use of Microsoft Power BI and Microsoft Excel to construct dashboards for sales and internal usage Technical and IT internal support Education Master’s Degree in Data Science and Scientific Computing University of Trieste | Trieste, Italy March 2019 – July 2023
Combination of key areas of digital transformation: data science, statistics and artificial intelligence
Key Courses:
Machine Learning: Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Supervised Learning, Data Mining Algorithms, Advanced Programming, Mathematical Modeling Thesis: Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning applied to strategic simulation scenarios Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science University of Udine | Udine, Italy September 2015 – December 2018
Software development and complex data structures Algorithm complexities and optimization Mathematics and logic problem solving Diploma in Informatics and Telecommunications I.S.I.S “A. Malignani” | Udine, Italy September 2009 – June 2015
Programming with C++, Java, SQL basics Web development fundamentals Technical Skills Machine Learning & AI Paradigms: Supervised Learning, Deep Learning, Deep Reinforcement Learning Techniques: Neural Networks, Multilayer Perceptron, CNNs, Graph Convolutional Networks, DQN algorithm Applications: Regression, Classification, Naïve Bayes, Decision Trees Programming Languages Python (Expert): numpy, pytorch, pytorch-geometric, tensorflow, pyro, scikit-learn, pygame, yfinance, ipywidgets, plotly, FAST API Web Development: JavaScript, Node.js, React Databases: SQL, Redis, PostgreSQL Other: C++, C, Java, DAX, PowerQuery Tools & Platforms Data & BI: Power BI, Microsoft Excel, Azure Development: GitHub, CI/CD, Agile methodology Backend: Supabase, Artifact Specialized Abilities Algorithm computational complexities Software engineering and microservices architecture Design patterns Project management and versioning systems Organization and coordination of software engineering projects Languages Italian: Native English: Professional working proficiency
summary:
This is my CV:

Professional Experience

Data Scientist, Aftersales Business Intelligence

Gruppo Danieli | Buttrio, Italy September 2023 – September 2025

  • Streamlined data collection methods to minimize analysis errors
  • Automated repetitive tasks using Power BI, Python, and Azure, significantly saving time during the analytical process
  • Translated business requirements into data-driven solutions, providing value-added insights that directly contributed to strategic goals
  • Focused on pricing strategy development with multiple in-depth training sessions
  • Designed interactive dashboards and reports, providing real-time business intelligence to stakeholders
  • Implemented robust data governance practices, ensuring data integrity and compliance

Master Thesis Project Intern

Evolutionary Robotics and Artificial Life Lab, University of Trieste | Trieste, Italy March – July 2023
